modifiers.name: Melting Pot
modifiers.description: Teams must have at least one subclass of each element

modifiers.name: Praise the Sun
modifiers.description: All players must use a solar subclass

modifiers.name: Electric Boogaloo
modifiers.description: All players must use an arc subclass

modifiers.name: The Dark Side
modifiers.description: All players must use a void subclass

modifiers.name: Multi-tool
modifiers.description: Teams may only use at most one weapon of each type (one person has to use Sleeper Simulant!)

modifiers.name: Stormtroopers
modifiers.description: All team members must pick the same weapon types (e.g. auto - shotgun - sword)

modifiers.name: Standard Issue
modifiers.description: No exotic equipment (weapons and armor) is allowed
